source("child/library.R")

    filter, lag

The following object is masked from 'package:crosstalk':

source("functions/reactable_filters.R")
source("functions/click_renderer.R")


fromJSON("data/sources.json") |> 
  mutate(link2 = link) |> 
  relocate(link2, .before = link) |>
  reactable(
  columns = list(
    organisation = colDef(filterInput = selectFilter("filter1")),
    link2 = colDef(cell = click_renderer, name = "Go to Website", width = 100)
  ),
  filterable = TRUE,
  wrap = TRUE,
  resizable = TRUE,
  defaultPageSize = 10,
  minRows = 5,
  elementId = "filter1"
)
